name: Bad Robot!
description: Bad Robot! is a game about a robot created by an old scientist alien that has been infected with a nasty virus! The scientist, with hope that he can still save his beloved creation, initiate a full system reboot in order to reset the robot’s operational system to get rid of the virus. But there’s a problem: the reboot takes 4 minutes to complete. Can you keep the robot’s core stable long enough for him to be saved? In order to stabilize the robot you must do short tasks to fix the machinery inside the robot’s head when they malfunction because of the virus. You can move with WASD and interact with F. Every time the robot says a line, a machine is broken! Malfunctioning machines will have a visual indicator that it’s broken, and if the small battery next to it is shorting, you have to run to the fuse box and fix it so you can fix the machine afterwards!
